actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution condemning the use of violence in the current truckers' strike, and for other purposes.

summary.text: States that the House of Representatives condemns the use of violence in the truckers' strike as a means to demand settlement of any grievance, however legitimate. Expresses the sense of the House that the President should take such steps as may be necessary to assure prompt enforcement of all laws of the United States protecting the movement of persons and property in interstate commerce.

titles.title: Resolution condemning the use of violence in the current truckers' strike, and for other purposes.
